Our monkeys can adapt to any climate! Let’s hit the slopes.</p></div>\n\t\t<div class=\"logo\"><img src=\"/uploads/britishtri.png\"></div>\n\t</div>\n\n\n\n \n \n\n </div>\n </div>\n\n </div> \n </div>\n \n\n\n <!-- SOLUTION -->\n\n\n\n \n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n <div class=\" section section-header\" id=\"border-top-trigger\">\n\t<h2 class=\"page-heading\">the solution</h2>\n</div>\n\n <div class=\"section section--bg\">\n\n <div class=\"section-inner\">\n <div class=\"filters solution\">\n\n \n\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\"><h3 id=\"our-approach\">our approach</h3>\n\n<div class=\"image two-one\">\n<img src=\"/uploads/solution-1.gif\" />\n</div>\n\n<p>Our winter athletes perhaps don’t share the same profile as their summer counterparts, so the challenge was to connect the Team GB audience with a group of athletes that they previously had little knowledge of.\nBut before we did that, we needed to kick the campaign off with a bang….</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"one-year-to-go\">one year to go</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"http://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team GB’s winter athletes have come a long way in the last 30 years, so we set out to tell the story of Team GB over the decades and build anticipation of this exciting new crop of athletes that were set to make history.\nThis piece generated 250k organic views. An incredible result!</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"ones-to-watch\">ones to watch</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"> </a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>We set out to build the profile of 10 specific winter athletes running up to the games. We achieved this through mobile optimised 60 second profiles that married the athlete’s own social media posts with visual effects.\nThese generated over 100k views each.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"path-to-pyeong-chan\">path to pyeong chan</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>After we had introduced some of the key athletes we moved on to illustrating their stories whilst offering insights into their unique personalities.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"athlete-stat-cards\">Athlete Stat Cards</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video two-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>During the games, Team GB needed to announce which individual athletes we’re competing and when. To do this we created individual stat cards for over 70 athletes that featured key stats and showcased their personality.\nThis content series was deemed to be so strong, it was sold to Aldi as a sponsorship opportunity. A landmark moment in how Team GB optimise commercial opportunities for content.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"360-team-announcements\">360 Team Announcements</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-three\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team announcements leading up to the games are a key opportunity to drive awareness of the individual sports. We created an innovative solution which announced each team online through a 360 video.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"digital-displays\">Digital Displays</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Before, during and after the games, we produced a series of pieces that were featured on massive outdoor digital displays up and down the country. We even took over Piccadilly Circus as we welcomed home our heroes.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"steep--chill\">Steep &amp; chill</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>To top it all off, we went out with a bang with a seven part series called Steep &amp; Chill. Working with H&amp;K and DFS, we produced a series of comedy gaming episodes. These pieces ran during and after the games bringing our athletes to a whole new audience.\nThe Steep &amp; Chill series generated over 1 million views.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n</div>\n \n\n </div>\n </div>\n\n </div> \n </div>\n \n\n\n <!-- RESULTS -->\n\n\n \n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n\n <div class=\" section section-header\" id=\"border-top-trigger\">\n\t<h2 class=\"page-heading\">results</h2>\n</div>\n\n\n <div class=\"section\">\n <div class=\"section-inner\">\n\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>2m</h5>\n <p>Views</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>4k</h5>\n <p>Comments</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>146k</h5>\n <p>Likes</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>10k</h5>\n <p>Behind the Scenes</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n\n </div>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n\n\n <!-- GET IN TOUCH -->\n\n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n\n\t<div class=\" section section-header\">\n\t\t\n\t<a class=\"btn btn_invert \" href=#footer>\n\t\t<span class=\"inner\">\n\t\t\tget in touch\n\t\t</span>\n\t</a>\n\n\n\t</div>\n\n</div>\n\n\n <!-- SEE SOME MORE -->\n\n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n <div class=\" section section-header\" id=\"border-top-trigger\">\n\t<h2 class=\"page-heading\">featured work</h2>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"section section--bg\">\n\t<div class=\"section-inner\">\n\n\t\t<p class=\"section-description\">\n\t\t\tLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. />\n</div>\n\n<p>Our winter athletes perhaps don’t share the same profile as their summer counterparts, so the challenge was to connect the Team GB audience with a group of athletes that they previously had little knowledge of.\nBut before we did that, we needed to kick the campaign off with a bang….</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"one-year-to-go\">one year to go</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"http://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team GB’s winter athletes have come a long way in the last 30 years, so we set out to tell the story of Team GB over the decades and build anticipation of this exciting new crop of athletes that were set to make history.\nThis piece generated 250k organic views. An incredible result!</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"ones-to-watch\">ones to watch</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"> </a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>We set out to build the profile of 10 specific winter athletes running up to the games. We achieved this through mobile optimised 60 second profiles that married the athlete’s own social media posts with visual effects.\nThese generated over 100k views each.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"path-to-pyeong-chan\">path to pyeong chan</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>After we had introduced some of the key athletes we moved on to illustrating their stories whilst offering insights into their unique personalities.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"athlete-stat-cards\">Athlete Stat Cards</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video two-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>During the games, Team GB needed to announce which individual athletes we’re competing and when. To do this we created individual stat cards for over 70 athletes that featured key stats and showcased their personality.\nThis content series was deemed to be so strong, it was sold to Aldi as a sponsorship opportunity. A landmark moment in how Team GB optimise commercial opportunities for content.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"360-team-announcements\">360 Team Announcements</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-three\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team announcements leading up to the games are a key opportunity to drive awareness of the individual sports. We created an innovative solution which announced each team online through a 360 video.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"digital-displays\">Digital Displays</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Before, during and after the games, we produced a series of pieces that were featured on massive outdoor digital displays up and down the country. We even took over Piccadilly Circus as we welcomed home our heroes.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"steep--chill\">Steep &amp; chill</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>To top it all off, we went out with a bang with a seven part series called Steep &amp; Chill. Working with H&amp;K and DFS, we produced a series of comedy gaming episodes. These pieces ran during and after the games bringing our athletes to a whole new audience.\nThe Steep &amp; Chill series generated over 1 million views.</p>\n\n<hr />\n", "previous": { "next": { An incredible result!</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"ones-to-watch\">ones to watch</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"> </a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>We set out to build the profile of 10 specific winter athletes running up to the games. We achieved this through mobile optimised 60 second profiles that married the athlete’s own social media posts with visual effects.\nThese generated over 100k views each.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"path-to-pyeong-chan\">path to pyeong chan</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>After we had introduced some of the key athletes we moved on to illustrating their stories whilst offering insights into their unique personalities.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"athlete-stat-cards\">Athlete Stat Cards</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video two-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>During the games, Team GB needed to announce which individual athletes we’re competing and when. To do this we created individual stat cards for over 70 athletes that featured key stats and showcased their personality.\nThis content series was deemed to be so strong, it was sold to Aldi as a sponsorship opportunity. A landmark moment in how Team GB optimise commercial opportunities for content.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"360-team-announcements\">360 Team Announcements</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-three\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team announcements leading up to the games are a key opportunity to drive awareness of the individual sports. We created an innovative solution which announced each team online through a 360 video.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"digital-displays\">Digital Displays</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Before, during and after the games, we produced a series of pieces that were featured on massive outdoor digital displays up and down the country. We even took over Piccadilly Circus as we welcomed home our heroes.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n\n<h3 id=\"steep--chill\">Steep &amp; chill</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>To top it all off, we went out with a bang with a seven part series called Steep &amp; Chill. Working with H&amp;K and DFS, we produced a series of comedy gaming episodes. These pieces ran during and after the games bringing our athletes to a whole new audience.\nThe Steep &amp; Chill series generated over 1 million views.</p>\n\n</div>\n \n <div class=\"solution-section\">\n</div>\n \n\n </div>\n </div>\n\n </div> \n </div>\n \n\n\n <!-- RESULTS -->\n\n\n \n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n\n <div class=\" section section-header\" id=\"border-top-trigger\">\n\t<h2 class=\"page-heading\">results</h2>\n</div>\n\n\n <div class=\"section\">\n <div class=\"section-inner\">\n\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>2m</h5>\n <p>Views</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>4k</h5>\n <p>Comments</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>146k</h5>\n <p>Likes</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n <div class=\"result-block white\">\n <div class=\"result\">\n <h5>10k</h5>\n <p>Behind the Scenes</p>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n\n </div>\n </div>\n </div>\n \n\n\n <!-- GET IN TOUCH -->\n\n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n\n\t<div class=\" section section-header\">\n\t\t\n\t<a class=\"btn btn_invert \" href=#footer>\n\t\t<span class=\"inner\">\n\t\t\tget in touch\n\t\t</span>\n\t</a>\n\n\n\t</div>\n\n</div>\n\n\n <!-- SEE SOME MORE -->\n\n <div class=\"wrapper wrapper-wide\">\n <div class=\" section section-header\" id=\"border-top-trigger\">\n\t<h2 class=\"page-heading\">featured work</h2>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"section section--bg\">\n\t<div class=\"section-inner\">\n\n\t\t<p class=\"section-description\">\n\t\t\tLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. />\n</div>\n\n<p>Our winter athletes perhaps don’t share the same profile as their summer counterparts, so the challenge was to connect the Team GB audience with a group of athletes that they previously had little knowledge of.\nBut before we did that, we needed to kick the campaign off with a bang….</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"one-year-to-go\">one year to go</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"http://player.vimeo.com/video/203277091\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team GB’s winter athletes have come a long way in the last 30 years, so we set out to tell the story of Team GB over the decades and build anticipation of this exciting new crop of athletes that were set to make history.\nThis piece generated 250k organic views. An incredible result!</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"ones-to-watch\">ones to watch</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/219507067\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"> </a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>We set out to build the profile of 10 specific winter athletes running up to the games. We achieved this through mobile optimised 60 second profiles that married the athlete’s own social media posts with visual effects.\nThese generated over 100k views each.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"path-to-pyeong-chan\">path to pyeong chan</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/250096692\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>After we had introduced some of the key athletes we moved on to illustrating their stories whilst offering insights into their unique personalities.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"athlete-stat-cards\">Athlete Stat Cards</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video two-one\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/265170168\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>During the games, Team GB needed to announce which individual athletes we’re competing and when. To do this we created individual stat cards for over 70 athletes that featured key stats and showcased their personality.\nThis content series was deemed to be so strong, it was sold to Aldi as a sponsorship opportunity. A landmark moment in how Team GB optimise commercial opportunities for content.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"360-team-announcements\">360 Team Announcements</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-three\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/246404832\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Team announcements leading up to the games are a key opportunity to drive awareness of the individual sports. We created an innovative solution which announced each team online through a 360 video.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"digital-displays\">Digital Displays</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two big\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/253759404\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>Before, during and after the games, we produced a series of pieces that were featured on massive outdoor digital displays up and down the country. We even took over Piccadilly Circus as we welcomed home our heroes.</p>\n\n<hr />\n\n<h3 id=\"steep--chill\">Steep &amp; chill</h3>\n\n<div class=\"video one-two\">\\\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\" mozallowfullscreen=\"\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219?background=1\" webkitallowfullscreen=\"\" kwframeid=\"5\"></iframe>\n\n <a href=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/257931219\" data-lity=\"\" class=\"video-filter\"></a>\n\n</div>\n\n<p>To top it all off, we went out with a bang with a seven part series called Steep &amp; Chill. Working with H&amp;K and DFS, we produced a series of comedy gaming episodes.
